org.orgName: Western District Court of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT WESTERB DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON NORTHERN DIVISION
In Re Marie Robina Grayson, alias Marie Robina, for WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS ) No.2780 ORDER.

IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the stay of twenty days granted and directed in an order entered in this cause on the 20th day of July, 1914, be, and the same hereby is extended for an additional period of fourteen days, or to and inclusive of August 21, 1914, and the respondent herein is given to the date last mentioned in which to enter an appeal and the conditions of the petitioner to remain in force until such time and if appeal is prosecuted bond to be given as heretofore stated
IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
In Re Marie Robina Grayson, alias Marie Robina, for WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS.
FILED IN THE U. S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, Northern Division AUG 7-1914
div1.ab: FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk By EML Deputy
